title: Firefly + Serenity - Complete Set
description:
FIREFLY & SERENITY - COMPLETE SET

These are DVDRips of Firefly (TV Series, 2002) and
Serenity (Movies, 2005). All the DVD Extras are included.
File names ending with '+ C' denote optional commentaries.

Also included in this set are all the Serenity Comics (2006-
2014), Serenity (Tabletop RPG) and the soundtrack albums of 
both Firefly and Serenity (mp3s @ 320 kbps).

Q: Comics in digital form? How do I read them?

A: Comic book archives are just series of image files
   of pages stored in a single archive. There are several 
   good free Comic reader programmes available, personally 
   I use CDisplay and Honeyview. Comic archives can also be
   extracted to a series of image files /w Winrar, 
   Winzip or similar archivers/compressors.

FIREFLY (2002)

Total Size......: 7,61 GB (520 MB per episode)

                  Track 2 - 2.0 - (commentary, 80 kbps, aac)
